description:
11.106 freezeframes
Freeze video frames.

This filter freezes video frames using frame from 2nd input.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: freezeframes

options.description: Set number of first frame from which to start freeze.
options.name: first

options.description: Set number of last frame from which to end freeze.
options.name: last

options.description: Set number of frame from 2nd input which will be used instead of replaced frames.
options.name: replace
